All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Answer
The Answer class represents the answer page in the game.
Answer
The Answer class represents a player's answer in a game round.
CommunicationListener
The CommunicationListener interface defines the methods that must be implemented by classes that want to receive communication events.
CommunicationService
The CommunicationService class handles the communication with the server.
Constants
The Constants class provides constant values and utility methods for the game states.
Evaluation
The Evaluation class represents the evaluation of a game round.
Evaluation.PlayerScore
The PlayerScore class represents the score of a player.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FriendGameCreate
The FriendGameCreate class represents the page where the user can set up a game.
FriendGamePage
The FriendGamePage class represents the page where the user can choose to set up or join a game.
GameActivity
The GameActivity class represents the game activity of the application.
GameModel
The GameModel class handles the game logic and communication with the server.
GameStart
The GameStart class represents the start of a game.
GameStates
The GameStates interface defines the various states a game can be in.
GameStates.GameState
The GameState enum represents the different states a game can have.
GameTimerThread
A thread for managing game timers and game state transitions.
GameViewModel
ViewModel for the game, managing the game state and interactions with the GameModel.
GsonParser
The GsonParser class provides methods for converting JSON strings to Java objects and vice versa.
JoinGame
The JoinGame class represents the page where the user joins a game.
Joining
The Joining class represents the result of a player attempting to join a game.
JoiningResults
The JoiningResults interface defines the possible results of a player attempting to join a game.
JoiningResults.JoiningResult
The JoiningResult enum represents the different results of a player attempting to join a game.
JSON
The JSON class is an abstract base class for all JSON related classes.
MyAnswer
The MyAnswer class represents a player's answer in a game round.
MyJoining
The MyJoining class represents a player's joining request in the game.
MyJoiningRequests
The MyJoiningRequests interface represents the types of requests a player can make when joining a game.
MyJoiningRequests.RequestType
The RequestType enum represents the types of requests a player can make.
Preferences
A utility class for managing shared preferences.
Question
The Question class represents the question page in the game.
Question
The Question class represents a question in the game.
Question.SubQuestion
The SubQuestion class represents a sub-question of a question.
QuestionDetail
The QuestionDetail class represents the detailed view of a question in the game.
RoundPlayer
The RoundPlayer class represents the player for the current round in the game.
RoundStart
The RoundStart class represents the start of a round in the game.
Score
The Score class represents the score screen of the game.
ServerWaiting
The ServerWaiting class represents the state where the client is waiting for the server.
SetName
The SetName class represents the page where the user sets their name.
Settings
The Settings class represents the settings page of the application.
Start
The Start class represents the start of a round in the game.
StartingActivity
The StartingActivity class represents the starting activity of the application.
StartingStates
The StartingStates interface represents the different states of the starting process.
StartingStates.StartingState
The StartingState enum represents the different pages in the starting process.
Turn
The Turn class represents a turn in a game round.
Waiting
The Waiting class represents the waiting state in the game.
Waiting.WaitingPlayer
The WaitingPlayer class represents a player who is waiting.
WelcomePage
The WelcomePage class represents the welcome page of the application.
